long_description: This unique roll-top backpack from SealLine-offered here in a small size-provides watertight protection for around town and on the trail. Quick-clip flap closure allows easy, 1-handed fastening and unfastening. Breathable, ergonomic shoulder straps combine with a sternum strap and hideaway waistbelt for a comfortable, supportive fit. Breathable, waterproof back panel and tough, PVC-free coated polyester and urethane reinforcements. External zip pocket and carry handle. Features SealLine Modular Accessory Pocket(TM) system for attaching handy add-ons, such as a Zip Pocket(TM) or Mobile Electronic Case(TM), all sold separately.
short_description: This unique roll-top backpack from SealLine-offered here in a small size-provides watertight protection for around town and on the trail.
